ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:24:43. [CVDB146995] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:36:27. [Issue ID 250373]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Davis,Joe Maneely,Bill Elder,Bill Ward,Jack Davis,John Severin
ComicInfo.Inker: Jack Davis,Joe Maneely,Bill Elder,Bill Ward,Jack Davis,John Severin
ComicInfo.Title: Medical Specialists; Brigitte Bardot As Seen by Different Artists...; Perry Coma Is a Fraud; Russian Shut-Ups; Beatnik Goes to a Party; Peter Goon; Sea Hunt; Civil War Facts; Illustrated Little Willies; Sunshine Healthy; Architecture by Frank Lloyd Wrong; Realistic Children's Games; Rate Your Personality; How Different Nationalities Make Marriage Proposals; Awards from the Syndicate; The Line-Up; Mixed-Up Pocket Books
ComicInfo.Summary:
Brigitte Bardot rendered in the styles of famous artists and portraits.
The supposed explanations of where Civil War nicknames originated and how the battles were fought.
Life-changing moments in the lives of famous people, such as when Adolf Hitler was invited into the Munich Beer Hall.
Parody book covers where actual book titles have been mis-interpreted by the artists.
